quest.name: So You Want to Be a Machinist

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Hmmm, my prospectometer seems rather fond of you. Let's see, shall we...? Odd garb. Striking presence. Would I be right in assuming that you are one of those adventurous types?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Hmmm, my prospectometer seems rather fond of you. Let's see, shall we...? Odd garb. Striking presence. Would I be right in assuming that you are the outsider who helped save Ishgard?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, I thought as much! My prospectometer seldom lies! And let me just say, you have made the right choice in visiting our humble workshop.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ahem. Welcome to the Skysteel Manufactory, where miracles are born from aether, metal, and imagination!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: From cannons to ballistas, we develop and manufacture a range of weapons designed for slaying dragon invaders. ...But we are also accepting students who wish to take up a firearm and learn the techniques of the machinist!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: What say you? Are you interested in joining us, and exploring the machinist discipline?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Are you interested in exploring the machinist discipline?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You are? Well, of course you are! Otherwise my prospectometer would not have registered your obvious interest!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ah. In my excitement, I've neglected to introduce myself. The name's Stephanivien. Stephanivien de Haillenarte. And you are...?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You... No? How odd. I was certain my prospectometer had detected a high level of interest. Come now, you needn't be shy! I shall be here should you surrender to what is obviously your heart's desire!
